code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: shows nodular aggregates of basalioma cells are present in the dermis and exhibit peripheral palisading and retraction, melanin is also present within the tumor and in the surrounding stroma

observation.value: shows nodular aggregates of basalioma cells are present in the dermis and exhibit peripheral palisading and retraction, melanin is also present within the tumor and in the surrounding stroma

td.content: s:a white female aged 36 years presents with 7 weeks history of moderate ulcer on left elbow, moderate painful ulcer on the top of lower lip and moderate ulcer with irregular borders that sometime crusts or bleeds. o:Height 63 in, Weight 128 lbs, Temperature 99 F, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 17 a:Skin Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed 5-FU - 0.5 g topical cream, and ordered Shave biopsy.

content2.Unmatched: irregular borders that sometime crusts or bleeds
